message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product for sale. I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm really interested in the product, but $120 is a bit out of my price range. I'm willing to pay $85 for it.  What do you think?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit, so I can offer it to you for $110. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm still a bit higher than my budget, but I'm willing to pay $95 for it. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

I'm glad we're still in negotiations, Bob! I can see you're serious about the product, so I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer it to you for $105. Let's see if we can finalize the deal.

Alice, I appreciate your flexibility. While I understand you need to make a profit, $105 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $98.  If you're willing to come down a little more, we can finalize the deal.

I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. I'm willing to make one last concession, but I need to make sure I get a good deal. I can offer it to you for $105 is too high, but I can do $102. That's as low as I can go. Let's see if we can finalize the deal.
